name: Echo: Secrets of the Lost Cavern
name_original: Echo: Secrets of the Lost Cavern
description:
Echo: Secrets of the Lost Cavern is an educational adventure-puzzle game developed by Kheops Studio, MZone Studio and TOTM Studio. It came out on 05-07-2005. The Adventure Company published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Echo: Secrets of the Lost Cavern is available on PC.
